name: William Fuller
bio: William Fuller has published eight full-length books of poetry: byt (O Books, 1989), The Sugar Borders (O Books, 1993), Aether (Gaz, 1998), Sadly (Flood Editions, 2003), Watchword (Flood Editions, 2006), Hallucination (Flood Editions, 2011), Quorum (Seagull Books, 2012), Playtime (Flood Editions, 2015), and Daybreak (Flood Editions, 2020).
